Text: july conference on real optionsfind attached the programs for two backtwoback conferences on real options at Cambridge University in UK The two conferences are separate but complementary events The first conference cosponsored with Andersen Consulting and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter on July is a professional conference on Real Options Valuation in the Information Economy InternetHightechTelecom RDPharma Energy For info and online registration see wwwrogroupcom The second is the th Annual International Conference on Real Options Theory Meets Practice the annual industry event where academics and practitioners get together to share the latest developments on theory and applications coorganized with U Cambridge on July For info and online registration see wwwrealoptionsorg Among the two events we are pleased to present an extensive array of practitioner and academic presentations sharing of experiences by corporate executives and panel discussions by experts from leading organizations and universities Our keynote speaker this year will be Myron S Scholes codeveloper of the BlackScholes option valuation Interested participants must register for the conference preferably on line and indicate hotel preferences among hotels by June latest We look forward to seeing you at this exciting event and would appreciate if you share this with interested colleagues CamJulyprofconferencedoc Confprogramdoc
